taxonomy.title: Culture
taxonomy.description: This facet describes the culture(s) associated with an object (who created or used it, or is depicted). The organization combines general geographic range with cultural groupings.
taxonomy.notes:
While cultures tend to be associated with location, the range of a culture does not neatly match political boundaries. ******************** Notes for a future revision:
In a future revision, it might be useful to make this into a "who" facet. Such a "who" facet would have these major sub-facets: • Person (personal name of specific person) • Culture • Profession (e.g., shoemaker, weaver) • Role (e.g., wife) • Rank (e.g., royalty, serf, slave, caste) • Gender (e.g., male, female, hermaphrodite) • Age (e.g., adult, elderly, adolescent, child)
